casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Mark Leon CONNER No. 345P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Joseph P. Lattimore, Attorney at Law, for Conner, Mark Leon. Douglas W. Corkhill, Assistant Attorney General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of October 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
